content: this legal text is a summary of a court case called cassation that took place on march 17th 2022 the case involved a dispute between a plaintiff and a defendant over joint property the appellate court ruled that in order for a spouse to claim compensation for joint property they must prove that there has been an irreversible mixing of funds between personal and community funds the defendant was able to prove this confusion by showing that the transfer of inheritance property and sale proceeds to a joint account were used for marital expenses the court upheld the defendants claim for compensation of joint property based on legal concepts and factual presumption the plaintiff appealed the decision to the court of cassation arguing that the legal concept of factual presumption was disregarded the court of cassation will now review the case and make a decision
